description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Race one of six high performance cars in one of three modes; Battle, Elimination, and Poker. Race online, singleplayer, or splitscreen. UPDATE:  Added splitscreen multiplayer
